Project.Description: Dual Power Generation is a Senior Design Project. Our goal was to turn Solar and Wind into energy. The group consisted of Electrical and Computer Engineers. As a Computer Engineer, my role was to calculate the Max Power between Solar and Wind and display the information to our end user.

GlobalScripts is a personal powershell project. When using powershell, the GlobalScript code defines framework in powershell that can be used throughout the powershell session time.

The code uses PowerShell, SQL Server, and XML. Powershell for the obvious reasons. SQL Server for private data that should not be shared. XML is to define the specific environment the code is running on (i.e. different computers and the directories on them).
